title: Really good story
review: It was worth 2 and half hours of my time, excellent move! Bale and Damon did awesome job.

title: Disaster
review: 1st and 2nd part were so good, third was a bit worse, this one is boring disaster. Without any imagion, classic undead-zombie garbage, they ruined perfectly good idea of 1st two parts.

title: Awfull
review: Pointless movie, please give me 2 hours of my life back...

title: I'm speechless...
review: This is the first movie that brought chills in my bones...psycho horror-thriler messes with your mind. I have never watched something like this its amazying.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Well spent 2.5 hours
review: Nice story, a little bit slow but I'm fine with that. I would recomend it to everyone, masterpiece by Brand Pitt and Dicaprio.

title: Nice thriler
review: This movie hold my concentration for whole two and half hour, you cant miss any detail if you want to follow and I enjoyed it very much. Only dissapointing part is the end of the movie which is done too simple and unrealistic.

title: Masterpiece
review: Everyone should watch this movie, I would describe it with only one word and that is masterpiece. I'm sute Phoenix will win Oscar foe this.

title: Awesome movie
review: In same time funny and serious, it deserved all Oscars gained. I would recomed it to everyone
